description: Dino Dini is back and so is Kick Off! As the original advertising for the game in 1989 declared: "Playing it is easy, mastering it will take time - A lot of time". When you score an amazing header goal in injury time to win a match after coming back from behind, it feels like nothing on earth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU Graphics: Dedicated Graphic Card
